alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:26PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 815 PM MST... At 723 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goldfield Ranch, or 10 miles northeast of Fountain Hills, moving south-southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Round Valley, Sunflower, Granite Reef Dam, McDowell Mountain Park, Saguaro Lake, Goldfield Ranch, Rio Verde, and Fort McDowell. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 185 and 218. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Tonto Basin
